dependencies.description: Multiple alignment of nucleic acid and protein sequences.
dependencies.name: clustalw

dependencies.description:
DIALIGN-TX: greedy and progressive approaches for segment-based multiple
sequence alignment
dependencies.name: dialign-tx

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
MAFFT is a multiple sequence alignment program for unix-like operating
systems. It offers a range of multiple alignment methods, L-INS-i
(accurate; for alignment of <~200 sequences), FFT-NS-2 (fast; for
alignment of <~30,000 sequences), etc.
dependencies.name: mafft

dependencies.description:
MUSCLE is one of the best-performing multiple alignment programs
according to published benchmark tests, with accuracy and speed that are
consistently better than CLUSTALW.
dependencies.name: muscle

dependencies.description:
PCMA is a progressive multiple sequence alignment program that combines
two different alignment strategies.
dependencies.name: pcma

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependencies.description:
POA is Partial Order Alignment, a fast program for multiple sequence
alignment in bioinformatics. Its advantages are speed, scalability,
sensitivity, and the superior ability to handle branching / indels in
the alignment.
dependencies.name: poamsa

dependencies.description:
Experimental version of PROBCONS with parameters estimated via
unsupervised training on BRAliBASE
dependencies.name: probconsrna

dependencies.description:
TM-align is an algorithm for sequence-order independent protein
structure comparisons.
dependencies.name: tmalign

dependencies.description:
The ViennaRNA Package consists of a C code library and several stand-
alone programs for the prediction and comparison of RNA secondary
structures.
dependencies.name: viennarna

description: T-Coffee is a multiple sequence alignment program.
name: tcoffee

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
